Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.services.Services

  • @Path(value="/")
public class Services
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains rest services and action functions for web applications version 1.0

        @POST
@Path(value="/signup")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String signUp(@FormParam(value="name")
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         @FormParam(value="email")
                                         java.lang.String email,
                                         @FormParam(value="pass")
                                         java.lang.String pass)
        Signup rest service, this service will be called to add new user
        Parameters:
        name - provide user name
        email - provide user email
        pass - provide user password
        Returns:
        status json

        @POST
@Path(value="/updatePosition")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String updatePosition(@FormParam(value="id")
                                                 java.lang.String id,
                                                 @FormParam(value="lat")
                                                 java.lang.String lat,
                                                 @FormParam(value="long")
                                                 java.lang.String lon)
        UpdatePosition service ,this service called to make User can update his/her position in the system to be his/her current position.
        Parameters:
        id - provide user id
        lat - provided Latitude of current user's position
        lon - provide Longitude of current user's position
        Returns:
        status json
